concept.title: Zooming in and out
concept.shortdesc: One of the easiest ways to change the magnification of the drawing is to zoom in or out by a preset increment. On the Zoomtoolbar, the Zoom In tool doubles the current magnification of the drawing. The

conbody.p: Zoom Out tool reduces the magnification of the drawing by half. The portion of the drawing located at the center of the current viewport remains centered on the screen as you zoomin and out.
